name: autofill-forms
description: An extension that autofills forms with your data.
author: Abhishek V <abhishekv.dev@gmail.com>

scripts.pre-commit-check: git diff --cached --quiet --exit-code -- package.json || { echo 'Checking package.json version...'; CURRENT_VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json); STAGED_VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' $GIT_DIR/cache/index | head -n1); if [ "$CURRENT_VERSION" != "$STAGED_VERSION" ]; then echo 'Error: package.json version must be bumped before committing.'; exit 1; fi }
